title: BetFact
author: BetFact

content: HelloWe are here to offer the online sports betting platform a special offer. The betfact is that this new software company will help you grow your brand in your local country. We don’t charge you a setup fee You don’t need the KYC processSupport over 150 sports and 2000 CasinosSetup your own language and own design by BetFact free of chargeSetup your local payment methodsWEB, Mobile, Mobile AppControl your Back Office, Users, Games, Bets, FinancialRequest new development for your website free of chargeThe % may be different, but we usually charge the partners 30%-35% for our company and 70%-65% for you when you make a profit.Please call us if you are looking to open your own online sports betting platform. Skype ID: live:.cid.f203ceaa9e7c82d4Telegram ID : Levon2023Email: Sale@betfact.com Company address: https://betfact.com/live website for check our products : https://xazar.bet/

comments.author: acroman08
comments.body: just a tip regarding your ANN thread, since you are a Copper member you could improve your ANN thread by including images on it and showcasing the website you have worked on or a demo website showing your finished work. putting those could take the attention of an interested client since they have an idea of how your finished work lookedWelcome to the forum btw!

comments.author: Sim_card
comments.body: Welcome to the forum.You are in the right place to promote your service and I can see that you have bought a corper membership, that's good. Why is your advert is only a write up,when you can post the picture of what you are introducing to us,so that one can have a proper picture of what you mean. Pictures with also make it look quality and attractive for forum members to get a trial.You can upload pictures through Talkimg.com

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Welcome to bitcointalk.Aside from the suggestion that you have already received firm the post above mine about including images into your Ann thread to make it look more professional, you should also try to create another thread in  Services board because form what I can see, you're offering a service which means it will fit well in the service board.Quote from: BetFact on July 27, 2023, 02:50:06 PMHello Thank you for your all nice guys here we are happy ! yes we are new here and need some time to find out how things going on here .It's not that difficult here you just have to go through the forum rules so that you won't do anything that will lead to your account getting banned because as soon as you do that will be the end of your business here in the forum since you ain't allowed to operate another account while one of the account you own has been banned.Here's the rule: Unofficial list of (official) Bitcointalk.org rules, guidelines, FAQJust familiarize yourself with it, and also make sure you go through the Ann thread of some other companies here so as to get an idea of how to improve your own.

comments.author: decodx
comments.body: Welcome to the community, BetFact! You're in the right place to promote your service. This forum gathers quite a big gambling community, so there's potential for some good connections.I agree with the suggestions to showcase your finished work. It's not just about credibility, but it gives potential clients an idea of what they can expect from you.As a new software company, it would be great if you could share some insights into your team's background and expertise. Knowing the people behind the platform can really inspire confidence. Also, could you please share some details about the design and functionality of your platform? We're all curious to learn more about it! When will you complete your official website to better showcase your work?Good luck with your business, and once again, welcome to the forum!

comments.author: Eureka_07
comments.body: Quote from: BetFact on July 27, 2023, 02:22:35 PM<snip>Welcome to the forum! Good luck with your business! It's great to see that you've already bought a copper membership. The design is fine; however, somehow, you lack some margins/paddings, especially on bigger viewport sizes. It looks superb on mobile, though. You need to improve the responsiveness of it, overall. The only thing left to do is to update the OP with a better design.

comments.author: Pmalek
comments.body: Quote from: BetFact on July 27, 2023, 02:22:35 PMyou can check our company example here : https://xazar.bet/ Is this a real online casino or just a demo platform you set up to showcase your product?If it's live, I noticed a few things immediately. Before I continue, is anyone in your team a native English speaker or where are you from?I opened a random match from the live tab.- Football (soccer) doesn't have quarters. It has two halves.- What is "table match" supposed to mean? Match statistics maybe?- It's not called "Penality", but Penalty.- You have probably misspelled the name of the Stadium. I don't think such a stadium exists.- Celemnt torbin? I guess it's supposed to be Clement Turpin, the French referee. Names should be capitalized. When you click on the Register button, a new page pops up where it says "Registartion". The correct word is Registration. On top of the same page, there is a question saying "Already a have account?". It should be Already have an account?So the casino's name is Xazer.bet, but at the top of the page you have a button "About betbandi"! At the bottom of the page I can also see the text copyright BetFury. All that makes me think this can't possibly be a finished product for your clients. Still, things like that are an instant turn-off for me. Good luck with your business model and I hope you can make a professionally looking casino.

comments.author: ScamViruS
comments.body: I visited your website and it looks good. And you came to BitcoinTalk to promote your business, it is also a good decision for you, because there is a big gambling community in this forum. But your ANN thread is not interesting enough that it looks like a normal thread and gamblers will think there is nothing much here. So my suggestion would be to design this ANN thread attractively so that the first impression of your project gets good thoughts from the community members.Welcome to the forum.

comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: welcome to the forum, most people have already talked about this and I will repeat it too, since you are presenting a casino provider company, and like any service you must present a beautiful and flashy ann thread, have good campaign managers of subscriptions in this forum including in this same thread there is one of the best managers who posted here and they could create a good ann thread for you, it is important to draw more people's attention, mainly because what you are offering is the provision of delicate servicesfor example on your website and even in this thread you don't say anything about the company owners and team members and their academic qualifications and experiences, so how do you expect people to trust and use your company? imagine that you want to buy a customized car, something that the manufacturer builds it exclusively for you, you know famous companies, and in your street there is a new company, that you don't know the owner and experience of it. so will you go to the big companies like toyota, ford, mitsubishi or will you go to a new company on your street?

comments.author: decodx
comments.body: Quote from: Pmalek on July 29, 2023, 06:18:56 PMAll that makes me think this can't possibly be a finished product for your clients. Still, things like that are an instant turn-off for me. Good luck with your business model and I hope you can make a professionally looking casino. LOL! It's probably just a demo to showcase their service or software, because when I tried searching for xazar.bet casino, I couldn't find any mention of them online. But you made a valid point; even if it is a demo, the site should be finished and polished because this looks totally unprofessional. I mean, if they want to attract potential clients, they should present themselves in the best possible way, right? A half-baked website doesn't really inspire confidence. So, if they're serious about their business, they better step up their game and give us something more professional.

comments.author: decodx
comments.body: Quote from: BetFact on September 01, 2023, 06:22:26 PMHelloThis is live information and correct, but we are showing the product which's why some buttons and information or not related to the domain name. when you start working with us we solve if there is any issues also you can provide your own content for your brand I get what you're saying. Pmalek was probably talking about all those typos and spelling issues, which can really turn off potential clients. Most regular folks don't care about the technical stuff on a website; they just want it to look good. That's the whole point of a demo presentation – you've gotta make it shine, or you'll lose a bunch of potential customers in the first few seconds. Quote from: BetFact on September 01, 2023, 06:19:14 PMThank you for your nice suggestions. If you know any members and trusted one please forward for us . It might be a good idea to post your request in the Services board. We've got some trusted members here with awesome graphic skills who'd be up for the task.
